name: Recipe: Triple-Layered Consommé
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Triple-Layered Consommé.

value.name: Ham
value.desc: Smoked leg meat. Even the thinnest slice is packed full of flavor.

value.name: Fowl
value.desc: A fresh chunk of fowl. Handled properly, it can make a hearty meal.

value.name: Bamboo Shoot
value.desc: A fresh young bamboo shoot, straight out of the ground. It is a delicious cooking ingredient with an exotic aroma, found exclusively in bamboo-growing regions.

value.name: Mushroom
value.desc: Hardy common fungi. Can grow anywhere with the right amount of shade and moisture.

value.name: Triple-Layered Consommé
value.desc: A neatly arranged dish. The Ham, Fowl, and Bamboo Shoots have been sliced into threads of equal length, and they've been laid out neatly in the soup bowl after being steamed at high heat, before being covered in consommé. The layers are distinct, and the mouthfeel is salty yet fresh.

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Purchase from Chef Mao at Wanmin Restaurant</color>
